name.ja_JP: ファクションアドバンスカップ<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

info.en_US: Refight several midgame battles found during your quests for the factions!
info.de_DE: Bekämpfe nochmals die späteren Bosse aus den Quests der Fraktionen!
info.zh_CN: 再次对抗几个中期派系任务！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.ja_JP: ゲーム中盤のファクションクエストで出会った敵ともう一度戦おう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.ko_KR: 중기 세력 퀘스트 진행 중 싸웠던 몬스터들과 다시 싸우세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

core.condition: quest.fd-2-meerkat-cave.solved && quest.rhg-2-crate_smuggle.solved && quest.rftc-3-metalstuff.solved && quest.miners-1-dirtbunnies.solved && quest.bg-2-goat_cave_1.solved && quest.nomadAdv-3-sandman_tomb_1.solved && quest.bakiGuard-2-evil_guard.solved && quest.jungleTrader-2-snowman_thief_2.solved && quest.jungleGreens-2-plantSearch_1.solved

objective.en_US:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]!
Don't let them \c[3]regenerate over the flames\c[0]!
objective.de_DE:
Besiege die \c[3]Rasegeier\c[0] im \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]!
Verhindere ihre \c[3]Regenation über den Flammen\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN:
击败\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0]!
不要让它们在\c[3]火中做自己\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]の\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]\c[0]を倒せ！
\c[3]炎の上で回復\c[0]させないようにしよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Have another duel with \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0], Bakii'Kums most treasonous guard!
And also trash his \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]s\c[0] while you're at it!
objective.de_DE:
Liefere dir ein weiteres Duell mit der \c[3]Wache Billston\c[0], Bakii'Kums Hochverräter!
Und wirf auch gleich seine \c[3]Legionsgeschütze v2\c[0] auf den Müll, wenn du schon mal dabei bist!
objective.zh_CN:
再次与巴基库姆最险恶的守卫\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]决斗!
记得顺带消灭掉他的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
バキーイ・クムの裏切者、\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]ともう一度戦い倒せ！
\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]もついでに壊そう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
바키쿰의 가장 불성실한 경비원인 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]과 다시 결투하세요!
그리고 그의 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]도 부수세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Defeat the mighty metallic \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/mine-diggingbot-quest]\c[0] in the \c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0]!
Try to keep its \c[3]heat\c[0] in a \c[3]balanced state\c[0]!
objective.de_DE:
Besiege den mächtigen metallischen \c[3]Schmelz-Digmo\c[0] in der \c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0]!
Versuche seine \c[3]Hitze im Gleichgewicht zu halten\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN:
在\c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0]击败强大的\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/mine-diggingbot-quest]\c[0]!
注意保持其\c[3]热能\c[0]在\c[3]稳定状态\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0]の強力なロボット、\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/mine-diggingbot-quest]\c[0]を倒せ！
\c[3]熱暴走\c[0]させないようにしよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
\c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0]에 있는 단단한 금속 \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/mine-diggingbot-quest]\c[0]을 처치하세요! 
녀석의 \c[3]열기\c[0]를 \c[3]균형 잡힌 상태\c[0]로 유지해야 합니다!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.autumn-fall/buffalo-fire-quest]\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0]!
Overcome it using \c[3]ice\c[0] and \c[3]angles\c[0]!
objective.de_DE: Besiege den \c[3]Gluthuuf\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0]! Überliste ihn mit \c[3]Eis\c[0] und \c[3]Winkelmanövern\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN:
在\c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0]击败\c[3]\v[combat.name.autumn-fall/buffalo-fire-quest]\c[0]!
找好\c[3]角度\c[0]，用\c[3]冰\c[0]将其击破!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0]の\c[3]\v[combat.name.autumn-fall/buffalo-fire-quest]\c[0]を倒せ！
\c[3]氷\c[0]と\c[3]角度\c[0]をうまく利用するのがコツだ！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/snowman-jungle-boss]\c[0] who has resettled to \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]!
Break his defense by using the teleporting \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/heater]\c[0]!
objective.de_DE:
Besiege den \c[3]Karotto Fruchtsucher\c[0], der nach \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] umgezogen ist!
Durchbrich seine Verteidigung mittels des \c[3]Höllenglut-Plasmaofens\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN:
击败定居在\c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]的\c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/snowman-jungle-boss]\c[0]!
传送\c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/heater]\c[0]来破坏其防御!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]に住み着いた\c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/snowman-jungle-boss]\c[0]を倒せ！
\c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/heater]\c[0]を利用して、敵の防御を無効化しよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
\c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]에 다시 정착한 \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/snowman-jungle-boss]\c[0]를 처치하세요!
\c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/heater]\c[0]를 텔레포트시키면 방어를 부술 수 있습니다!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/sandman-1]\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]!
\c[3]Quicksand\c[0] may be annoying but \c[3]teleporters\c[0] are your friend!
objective.de_DE: Besiege den \c[3]König Kaktorro\c[0] im \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]! \c[3]Treibsand\c[0] kann nervig sein, doch \c[3]Teleporter\c[0] helfen aus!

在\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]击败\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/sandman-1]\c[0]!

objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]の\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/sandman-1]\c[0]を倒せ！
\c[3]流砂\c[0]に巻き込まれないよう、\c[3]テレポーター\c[0]をうまく活用しよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]에 있는 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/sandman-1]\c[0]를 처치하세요!
\c[3]유사\c[0] 때문에 걸리적거릴 수도 있지만, \c[3]텔레포터\c[0]가 있으니 걱정 마세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
